Mercator Class Reference

#include <mercator.h>

static double LatToY (double lat)
static double YToLat (double y)

Detailed Description

The Mercator class provides a number of static functinos for converting between degrees (latitude and longitude) and coordinates (x and y) for display on a map, using thte Guidermannian function.
